data.name: Puzzle Quest 3 - Founders Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become a founding hero of Puzzle Quest 3 with this limited-time DLC pack, available only during the Early Access period. Kickstart your adventure with all the tools and resources needed to explore the lands of Etheria. You'll receive Steam Exclusive gear, including Eveline's Locket and the Mirror Shield, in addition to 1 month of VIP membership and other resources to help you along your journey.

The Founders Pack Includes:

  • 1 Epic Necklace (Eveline’s Locket)
  • 1 Epic Shield (Mirror Shield)
  • 1 month VIP membership
  • 400 Random Minor Shards
  • 800 Random Lesser Shards
  • 500 Gems
  • 100 Crowns
  • 5,000 Gold

Please note:
  • The contents of this DLC bundle are not tradeable or refundable.
  • The VIP membership access included in this bundle is a one-time purchase and is not recurring. Additional time for the VIP membership can be purchased in-game via the store menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
